      "recommendation": "Implement a mechanism to refresh tokens securely and consider using shorter expiration times combined with refresh tokens to enhance security."

      "title": "Lack of Audience Restriction",
      "severity": "MEDIUM",
      "cwe_id": "CWE-346",
      "description": "The application validates the audience but does not enforce strict checks on the audience claims, which could allow tokens intended for one audience to be used in another context.",
      "line_numbers": [20],
      "recommendation": "Ensure that the audience claim is strictly validated against expected values to prevent token misuse across different parts of the application."

      "title": "Potential for Token Replay Attacks",
      "severity": "HIGH",
      "cwe_id": "CWE-295",
      "description": "The application does not implement any mechanism to prevent replay attacks, which could allow an attacker to reuse a valid token.",
      "line_numbers": [20],
      "recommendation": "Implement additional checks such as token blacklisting or nonce values to prevent replay attacks."
    }
  ]
